# e-prime
npm module for detecting ['to be'](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E-Prime) verbs.

## Install

```shell
npm install e-prime
```

## Use

```javascript
var eprime = require('e-prime');
var problems = eprime('NodeJs is awesome :)');
// problems -> [{ index: 7, offset: 2 }]
```
